item.title: Colorado woman accused of killing her children extradited from UK to US
item.description: Kimberlee Singler is facing murder charges in Colorado in the deaths of her 9-year-old daughter and 7-year-old son.

item.title: UK social media campaigners among five denied US visas
item.description: The Trump administration bans five people who have called for tech regulation from entering the country.

item.title: British boy, 13, fatally stabbed in Portugal
item.description: Tributes have been paid to the boy who has been named by a local basketball club as Alfie Hallett.

item.title: It's time for Wright to retire - Van Gerwen
item.description: Three-time world champion Michael van Gerwen says Peter Wright should retire following his defeat in the PDC World Darts Championship.

item.title: Flu cases falling ahead of Christmas, experts say
item.description: UK health agency says drop is encouraging news, but warns flu could still bounce back in new year.
